ygData.subject: Re: Guild Meeting in Chat on Wednesday
ygData.msgSnippet: Kurt, See you in chat Wed. Give me a tell in game when you play Bambus. I have a lvl 5 gnome now as Brell Serilis as my primary character. He is Dedric, a
ygData.messageBody:
Kurt,
See you in chat Wed. Give me a tell in game when you play Bambus. I have a lvl 5
gnome now as Brell Serilis as my primary character. He is Dedric, a necro.

Barstaad wrote:

> From: "Barstaad" <barstaad@...>
>
> Wednesday is my day off, so I can easily be there at 9:30. I'm currently
> experimenting with different classes and races, so I don't quite know who I
> will be playing, but I'm tending towards my gnome warrior, Bambus.
>
> Getting excited about the guild!
>
> Kurt
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 10:47 AM
> Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Guild Meeting in Chat on Wednesday
>
> | From: David Lari <kerik@...>
> |
> | Okay, I'll be the guild master.
> |
> | I haven't heard any negative comments about the name 'Unity', so I think
> that will
> | be the name unless someone else has something better. So, let's make plans
> for this
> | Wednesday to meet in chat.
> |
> | I will make the channel 'Unity' and the password will be 'rainbow' in all
> lower case
> | (and case does matter.) If you have any trouble getting into the chat
> room, just
> | contact me directly, my chat name is Lari.
> |
> | Now we need a time to get 10 people all together at once. I am in Eastern
> Daylight
> | Time. I can be on as early as 4:30pm EDT, and as late as 10:30pm EDT. If
> we shoot
> | for early in that window, we can get some of our European members on, but
> will miss
> | the US Pacific time people who may still be at work. Let's tentatively set
> it for
> | 9:30pm EDT, this Wednesday. Please let me know if you will be able to
> attend the
> | chat at that time. If you cannot, then please tell me a time when you can,
> in case I
> | have to reschedule.
> |
> | We will work first to create the guild on Brell Serilis, and then spread
> it to other
> | servers fairly quickly.
> |
> | I would also suggest we need to describe the guild in OOC and IC terms.
> OOC it will
> | be a guild that is open to tolerant, fair-minded people who are GLBT or
> affirming.
> | But what do we want it to be 'in character'. I'd suggest that it certainly
> not
> | discriminate at all based on race or class. Also, do we want to promote
> RPing, or
> | just encourage it, or not bother with it? Or do we just want a guild to
> provide help
> | and friendship to our sister and brother guild mates (such as selling
> banded armor
> | at a steep discount and things like that?)
> |
> | If anyone has any better ideas or plans, please share them.
> |
> | Dedric of Ak'anon
> | Gnome Necromancer of the 5th circle of life.
> | Brell Serilis
> |
> |
> | --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
> |
> | Having difficulty getting "in synch" with list members?
> | http://www.onelist.com
> | Try ONElist's Shared Calendar to organize events, meetings and more!
> |
> | ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> |
> |
